name: @m1ch3lcl/simple-eventstore
description: A simple Node.JS + OCaml based event store

scripts.build: npm run ocaml:read && npm run ocaml:write
scripts.ocaml:read: cd ocaml/ && ocamlc unix.cma str.cma -o read_ocaml.bin read_ocaml.ml
scripts.ocaml:write: cd ocaml/ && ocamlc unix.cma str.cma -o write_ocaml.bin write_ocaml.ml

author: Cl√©ment Michel
